iter.c

00001 /* iter.c -- sequential list unpacking ------- */
00002 
00003 #include "ext.h"
00004 #include "ext_common.h"
00005 
00006 typedef struct iter {
00007     t_object i_ob;
00008     t_atom *i_av;
00009     short i_ac;
00010 } t_iter;
00011 
00012 t_symbol *ps_bang;
00013 void *iter_class;
00014 
00015 void iter_assist(t_iter *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00016 void iter_int(t_iter *x, long n);
00017 void iter_float(t_iter *x, double f);
00018 void iter_bang(t_iter *x);
00019 void iter_list(t_iter *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av);
00020 void iter_anything(t_iter *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av);
00021 void *iter_new(long dummy);
00022 void iter_free(t_iter *x);
00023 void iter_resize(t_iter *x, long size);
00024 
00025 int main()
00026 {
00027     setup((t_messlist **)&iter_class, (method)iter_new, (method)iter_free, (short)sizeof(t_iter), 0L, A_DEFLONG, 0);
00028     addint((method)iter_int);
00029     addbang((method)iter_bang);
00030     addmess((method)iter_list,"list", A_GIMME, 0);
00031     addmess((method)iter_anything,"anything",A_GIMME,0);
00032     addmess((method)iter_assist,"assist",A_CANT,0);
00033     addfloat((method)iter_float);
00034     ps_bang = gensym("bang");
00035     finder_addclass("Lists","iter");
00036 
00037     return 0;
00038 }
00039 
00040 void iter_assist(t_iter *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s)
00041 {
00042     if (m == ASSIST_INLET)
00043         sprintf(s,"list to be Unraveled");
00044     else 
00045         sprintf(s,"Sequential Output of Incoming list");
00046 }
00047 
00048 void iter_int(t_iter *x, long n)
00049 {
00050     iter_resize(x,1);
00051     x->i_ac = 1;
00052     SETLONG(x->i_av,n);
00053     outlet_int(x->i_ob.o_outlet,n);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void iter_float(t_iter *x, double f)
00057 {
00058     iter_resize(x,1);
00059     x->i_ac = 1;
00060     SETFLOAT(x->i_av,f);
00061     outlet_float(x->i_ob.o_outlet,f);
00062 }
00063 
00064 void iter_bang(t_iter *x)
00065 {
00066     short i;
00067     t_atom *av;
00068     
00069     for (i=0, av = x->i_av; i < x->i_ac; i++,av++) {
00070         if (av->a_type == A_LONG)
00071             outlet_int(x->i_ob.o_outlet,av->a_w.w_long);
00072         else if (av->a_type == A_FLOAT)
00073             outlet_float(x->i_ob.o_outlet,av->a_w.w_float);
00074         else if (av->a_type == A_SYM)
00075             outlet_anything(x->i_ob.o_outlet,av->a_w.w_sym,0,0);
00076     }
00077 }
00078 
00079 void iter_list(t_iter *x, Symbol *s, short ac, Atom *av)
00080 {
00081     short i;
00082     
00083     iter_resize(x,ac);
00084     for (i=0; i < ac; i++,av++) {
00085         x->i_av[i] = *av;
00086         if (av->a_type==A_LONG)
00087             outlet_int(x->i_ob.o_outlet,av->a_w.w_long);
00088         else if (av->a_type==A_FLOAT)
00089             outlet_float(x->i_ob.o_outlet,av->a_w.w_float);
00090         else if (av->a_type==A_SYM)
00091             outlet_anything(x->i_ob.o_outlet,av->a_w.w_sym,0,0);
00092     }
00093     x->i_ac = ac;
00094 }
00095 
00096 void iter_anything(t_iter *x, Symbol *s, short ac, Atom *av)
00097 {
00098     short i;
00099     
00100     iter_resize(x,ac+1);
00101     outlet_anything(x->i_ob.o_outlet,s,0,0);
00102     x->i_av[0].a_w.w_sym = s;
00103     x->i_av[0].a_type = A_SYM;
00104     for (i=0; i < ac; i++,av++) {
00105         x->i_av[i+1] = *av;
00106         if (av->a_type==A_LONG)
00107             outlet_int(x->i_ob.o_outlet,av->a_w.w_long);
00108         else if (av->a_type==A_FLOAT)
00109             outlet_float(x->i_ob.o_outlet,av->a_w.w_float);
00110         else if (av->a_type==A_SYM)
00111             outlet_anything(x->i_ob.o_outlet,av->a_w.w_sym,0,0);
00112     }
00113     x->i_ac = ac+1;
00114 }
00115 
00116 void *iter_new(long dummy)
00117 {
00118     t_iter *x;
00119     short i;
00120     
00121     x = (t_iter *)newobject(iter_class);
00122     x->i_ac = 0;
00123     x->i_av = NULL;
00124     outlet_new(x,0L);
00125     return x;
00126 }           
00127 
00128 void iter_free(t_iter *x)
00129 {
00130     if (x->i_av)
00131         sysmem_freeptr(x->i_av);
00132 }
00133 
00134 void iter_resize(t_iter *x, long size)
00135 {
00136     if (size!=x->i_ac) {
00137         if (x->i_av)
00138             sysmem_freeptr(x->i_av);
00139         if (size)
00140             x->i_av = (t_atom *)sysmem_newptr(size*sizeof(t_atom));
00141         else
00142             x->i_av = NULL;
00143         x->i_ac = size;
00144     }
00145 }
